name: Top Sender Networks
sql: SELECT VLAN_ID, NETWORK_ID, SUM(BYTES) AS total_bytes FROM (SELECT VLAN_ID,SRC_NETWORK_ID AS NETWORK_ID, SRC2DST_BYTES AS BYTES FROM flows $WHERE$ AND SRC_NETWORK_ID!=65535 UNION ALL SELECT VLAN_ID,DST_NETWORK_ID AS NETWORK_ID, DST2SRC_BYTES AS BYTES FROM flows $WHERE$ AND DST_NETWORK_ID!=65535) AS f $GROUPBY$ $ORDERBY$ $LIMIT$
